input.sentences: i ate some of the fruits off of the ceiling .
there were some nice flowers in the kitchen .
i went outside to meet the neighbors .
output.sentences: The fruits lit up the ceiling making them look even more enticing.
The man looked under the wood to see if one of the fruits had fallen there.
In the kitchen, the woman was placing flowers on the table to get ready for their guests.
Outside, the neighbors were waiting, trying to get into the house.
One of them was pleasently surprised to find out that he was invited to the soiree.
